CodeplexIssue.Title: Dispose() do not make the winword.exe quit

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml:
hey men,
please help me , you mean the [unmodifed] example01 cause proplems and winword doesnt shutdown?this is very exceptional because no trouble in this way for more than 5 years.(i face the problem some years ago and the reason was a third party plugin btw.)
Please let me know your NetOffice version and operation system (win 32/64) too. moreover: its a terminal session/remotedesktop in your scenario or not.
*i can't believe itSebastian

CodeplexComment.Author: aosp
